#summary The :last-child CSS pseudo-class matches any element that is the last child node of its parent.
#labels about-css

== Usage ==

{{{
<!-- HTML -->
<div>
    <p>Not the last child</p>
    <p>Not the last child</p>
    <p>This is the last child, and will have a green background</p>
</div>

/* CSS */
p:last-child {
    background: green;
}
}}}
